title: Without resources, Nova Scotia's homeless are more at risk for COVID-19
description: Physical distancing, self-isolating and proper hygiene — three key rules of living in Nova Scotia during the COVID-19 pandemic.But what if a person doesn't have the resources to follow those public health rules?It puts the person at risk for contracting and s…
